title: Ep. 498 - Leftism Is A Religion Of Self-Loathing
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, leftism is a religion of self-loathing. That has been made clear this week as white people across the country have gone out of their way to announce and advertise their white guilt. But the self-loathing goes way beyond race. Also Five Headlines including AG Barr revealing Antifa’s role in the riots. And in our Daily Cancellation, we cancel a maniac who went on CNN to announce that white children “don’t deserve innocence.”

If you like The Matt Walsh Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: WALSH and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/walsh
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
